title: client freeze
body: so my client keep freeze in champ select, my pc is new so it should not be the problem, is there anyone that has the same issu with me or just me unlucky :( i just lost 1 promo cuz of that

replies.body:
Unless your PC is pretty low-end, this is likely caused by a *poor connection* to our matchmaking servers. Since this is most often caused by problematic network settings, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common culprits for this.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

connection has no issues but i get the same problem pretty consistently. I have it do it at least once per session of play. To the point where I have had a warning about leaving que. There needs to be another way to fight this kind of problem other than submitting tickets i've had this issue since old client. I've used the hextech repair as well it comes up with no issues.
